english.segment1: Suffering and glory are the greatest powers that history has ever seen. I want to live a life worth writing about and more, because I lived a life, a life worth dying for.
english.segment3: We have made it my friends, were the closest generation to the end. They will never silence us with torture or in their prisons. We have made it my friends, were the closest generation to the end. They will never silence us with torture or in their prisons.
english.segment4: Tears will roll down our cheeks and our souls will get restless, but we will not be afraid of the lions teeth in our face. I will grab the beast by his mane and scream at the top of my lungs.

english.segment6: Our love is stronger than death. I will never deny my faith. I will never deny my faith. I will never deny my faith (my faith). Forever!
